org.cougaar.mts.rmi
Class SerializedMTImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      org.cougaar.mts.rmi.MTImpl
          org.cougaar.mts.rmi.SerializedMTImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, MT, SerializedMT
public class SerializedMTImpl
extends MTImpl
implements SerializedMT

Implementation of the SerializedMT rmi interface. It accepts a byte-array that can be deserialized into an AttributedMessage, rather than an actual AttributedMessage.

See Also:
Serialized Form
